result.title: Problem from SPOJ
result.content: Hello Codeforces Users! Today I started to solve problem for Interval Tree and found problems called "Can you answer these queries". But I solved only First and Third but hard to solve second one. I understand the statements, but I can't solve them. Searched on Google and found xiaodao s blog but i don't unserstand, because blog in chinese. Help me to solve this problem please!
